org.apache.taverna.server.master.localworker

Class IdAwareForkRunFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker.RunFactoryConfiguration
      • org.apache.taverna.server.master.localworker.AbstractRemoteRunFactory
        • org.apache.taverna.server.master.localworker.IdAwareForkRunFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurableRunFactory, ListenerFactory, RunFactory, FactoryBean

    @ManagedResource(objectName="Taverna:group=Server-3.1.0,name=RunFactory",
                 description="The factory for a user-specific forked run.")
public class IdAwareForkRunFactory
extends AbstractRemoteRunFactory
implements ConfigurableRunFactory
    A simple factory for workflow runs that forks runs from a subprocess.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows
